# C3BO Balance Patch

Hosting site for 5O OS battletested Beyond All Reason balance suggestions to improve gameplay based on real ingame cost-performance per unit category.

Feedback to: https://discord.com/channels/549281623154229250/1448671751662997536

-------

# Patch objectives:

All the recommended changes together should:
- Bring bot/veh power level a bit closer together.
- Encourage unit compositions at both t1 and t2.
- Help restore power level parity between t2 techtrees and factions.
- Encourage unused units to a reasonable cost/performance expected of the unit category.
- Ensure that units have a degree of weakness to something and a reasonable performance per category.
- Encourage the use of miscellaneous buildings that see no use and enrich the game variety of strategy.
---------
- - Additional compatibility option with TechCore patch, tweaks below. Please see TechCore setup instructions on my other github project. https://github.com/Cebolletoth/C3BOBAR/blob/main/TechCoreBAR.md
---------
------
# Welcome message
```
!welcome-message https://github.com/Cebolletoth/TechCore-Patch-BAR    Balance patch made by C3BO, see changes in link.

```
------

# Tweakunit codes

```
!bset tweakunits 

```

```

!bset tweakunits2 

```

```
!bset tweakunits3 

```

```
!bset tweakunits4 

```

IF USING TECHCORE - 
- PLEASE USE THE BELOW ALTERNATIVE 4TH TECHCORE COMPATIBILITY TWEAK INSTEAD OF THE STANDARD 4TH TWEAK ABOVE.
- PLEASE USE THE TECHBLOCKING PASSIVE XP REMOVAL TWEAKDEF BELOW THE ALTERNATIVE 4TH TWEAK.
- SET THE TECHBLOCKING THRESHOLDS ACCORDING TO THE INSTRUCTIONS GIVEN ON THE TECHCORE PROJECT.

```
!bset tweakunits4 

```
-----------
- - LoAsSaEl alternative 4th tweak
The experimental airlab for armada has been replaced by the respective's faction Scavenger shield building, this building acts as the new TechCore. Unfortunately the script of the building does not allow for the creation of units so in order to achieve that at the moment the NanoLootbox can be instantaneusly built next to the Sanctuary and used to create the blueprint. It will take a couple of additional clicks to do this but currently it is the best option available to me.

```
!bset tweakunits4 
```
#PASSIVE XP Removal tweakdef
```
!bset tweakdefs Zm9yIG5hbWUsIHVuaXREZWYgaW4gcGFpcnMoVW5pdERlZnMpIGRvCiAgICB1bml0RGVmLmN1c3RvbXBhcmFtcyA9IHVuaXREZWYuY3VzdG9tcGFyYW1zIG9yIHt9CiAgICB1bml0RGVmLmN1c3RvbXBhcmFtcy50ZWNoX3BvaW50c19nYWluID0gMAplbmQ

```


------
